property.name: recordId
property.label: Adventure Id
property.description: The ID of the Adventure to be displayed. Enter a specific record ID, or {!recordId} to dynamically display records.

property.name: metadataRecordName
property.label: Adventure Setting
property.description: Enter the name of the Adventure Setting Custom Metadata Type record that contains configuration for the adventure you want to display.

property.name: moduleProgressType
property.label: Module Progress Display Options
property.description: Select the style of the progress bar to display. Options are Progress Bar or Progress Ring.

property.name: displayStepTitle
property.label: Show Step Title
property.description: Select to display the step title.

property.name: displayStepSubTitle
property.label: Show Step Subtitle
property.description: Select to display the step subtitle.

property.name: showModuleTooltip
property.label: Show Module Tooltip
property.description: Select to display the module tooltip.

property.name: truncate
property.label: Truncate Module Title
property.description: Check this box if you’d like to truncate long Step Module titles. If unchecked, the title will wrap to the next line.

property.name: showLinks
property.label: Show Module Links
property.description: Check this box if you’d like to show the additional Step Module links displayed below the Step Module titles.

property.name: showOnlyMyTask
property.label: Show 'Only My Tasks' Toggle
property.description: Select to display 'Only My Tasks' Toggle.

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: tileVariant
property.label: Module Display Option
property.description: Select the Module default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow)

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: The CSS class name for custom styling.

property.name: listId
property.label: Component Group
property.description: Unique ID to link complimentary components together to share data.
